'''Ruddy Feyr''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|The pirate stumbles when he turns, slapping a palm onto the table to steady himself. In the process, he knocks a tankard to the ground, spilling a frothy beverage.}}
Ruddy Feyr and his team are currently busy celebrating their boatswain purchasing a genuine treasure map.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =
|none            = 
|other           =
* You can try drinking Feyr under the table for {{cp2|20}}.
** With [Sleight of Hand](/sleightOfHand/), you can pretend to drink, increasing your chances.
** The order of drinking is Aedyran mead ([Constitution](/constitution/) 11 or [Sleight of Hand](/sleightOfHand/) 4), gunpowder-laced grog ([Constitution](/constitution/) 13 or [Sleight of Hand](/sleightOfHand/) 5), and the terrible Hangman's Blood ([Constitution](/constitution/) 15 or [Sleight of Hand](/sleightOfHand/) 6).
* Doing so distracts [Ungwith the Craghearted](/ungwithTheCraghearted/) from her post.
}}
